revised_title: On the Alleged Correspondence of Rainfall at Madras with the Sun-Spot Period
tldr: The author examines the correlation between rainfall records at Madras and the sun-spot period, concluding that there is no significant correspondence between the two. The study suggests that the supposed cycle of rainfall in Madras does not align with the sun-spot cycle, and the mean differences between the observations and the calculated means do not support the claim of a definite periodicity in rainfall.
